#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pi;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pl;



int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.in", "r", stdin);
#endif

    string S;
    cin >> S;
    int F = 0, C = 127;
    int i = 0, j;
    while(i < S.size()){
        j = i;
        while(j < S.size() && S[j] == S[i]) j++;
        if(j - i > F){
            F = j - i;
            C = S[i];
        }
        if(j - i == F){
            if(C > S[i]) C = S[i];
        }
        i = j;
    }

    cout << ((char)C) << endl;
    cout << F << endl;

    return 0;
}
